Uses of Package
tv.freewheel.ad.interfaces

  • Packages that use tv.freewheel.ad.interfaces 
    Package Description
    tv.freewheel.ad.interfaces  
    tv.freewheel.renderers.interfaces  
  • Classes in tv.freewheel.ad.interfaces used by tv.freewheel.ad.interfaces 
    Class and Description
    IAdContext
    IAdContext is the main facade for ad requesting, should be created in each Activity that wants to display Ads.
    IAdInstance
    Internal context of an ad instance.
    IAdManager
    IAdManager is the IAdContext creator.
    IConstants
    The IConstants interface contains all the constants for ad serving and rendering
    ICreativeRendition
    Interface for creative rendition, only for renderer use by now.
    ICreativeRenditionAsset
    Interface for creative rendition asset, only for renderer use by now.
    IEvent
    IEvent is the value object for carrying out event info:
    IEventListener
    IEventListener is common interface for event listeners.
    IRendererController
    IRendererController is the common interface for controlling ad renderers.
    ISlot
    ISlot is the base Ad placement unit, which is used to play the ads.
  • Classes in tv.freewheel.ad.interfaces used by tv.freewheel.renderers.interfaces 
    Class and Description
    IAdInstance
    Internal context of an ad instance.
    IConstants
    The IConstants interface contains all the constants for ad serving and rendering
    ISlot
    ISlot is the base Ad placement unit, which is used to play the ads.
